text: Mezhdu etimi lyud'mi yest' takiye, kotoryye govoryat: "My veruyem v Boga"; no kogda oni podvergayutsya kakim libo ogorcheniyam za Boga, to eto ispytaniye lyudyam stavyat naravne s kazn'yu ot Boga. A yesli pridet pomoshch' ot Gospoda tvoyego, to oni govoryat: "My s vami". Ne znayet li Bog togo, chto v serdtsakh u etikh lyudey
